original_text: And Pharaoh took off his ring from his hand, and put it upon Joseph's hand, and arrayed him in vestures of fine linen, and put a gold chain about his neck;
korean_text: 자기의 인장 반지를 빼어 요셉의 손에 끼우고 그에게 세마포 옷을 입히고 금 사슬을 목에 걸고

sentences.original_text: And Pharaoh took off his ring from his hand
and put it upon Joseph's hand
and arrayed him in vestures of fine linen
and put a gold chain about his neck
